```{r}
library(gtrendsR)
library(ggplot2)

keywords = c("depression")

country = c("US")

time = ("2018-01-01 2023-11-03")

channel = "web"

my_data = gtrends(keywords, gprop = channel, geo = country, time = time)

time_my_data = my_data$interest_over_time

plot<-ggplot(data=time_my_data, aes(x=date, y=hits,group=keyword,col=keyword)) + 
        geom_line() + 
  xlab('Time') + 
  ylab('Relative Interest') + 
        theme(legend.title = element_blank(),
            legend.position="bottom",
            legend.text=element_text(size=12)) +
  ggtitle("Google Search Volume")
plot

```
